name: Tobis Cube
description:
tobis cube v0.5 is here! this is a parody game! it's supposed to be low-quality.

oh what's this? jeson wants you to explore the legendary HAUS because reasons? ok! explore the legendary HAUS to discover its secrets, inhabitants and sillies, all while wondering how this got past quality control.

tobis cube v0.5 contains the first 3 chapters of the full game. the final three will be released when they're finished :)
